snippet.title: Dragon Quest 11: Echoes of an Elusive Age Trailer - E3 2018
snippet.description:
Here's your latest look at the next installment in the long-running RPG series.

Watch more from E3 2018 here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3_7Btrf45o&index=1&list=PLraFbwCoisJAcQvOvliIp_1bYkRlB8cVP
